pages.text: Rockets require liquid fuels to launch. You can fuel your rocket in two ways: manually using fluid containers, or automatically using Mekanism's pipe system.

pages.title: Manual Fueling
pages.text: Place your rocket on a launch pad, then sneak-right-click to open the inventory.

pages.title: Automated Fueling
pages.text: For automated fueling, connect Mekanism mechanical pipes directly to the $(bold)bottom$() of your launch pad.$(br)$(br)The launch pad will automatically transfer liquid fuel from the pipes into any rocket placed on top of it.

pages.title: Convert Gas to Liquid
pages.text: Mekanism produces fuels in gas form, but rockets require liquids. Use a Rotary Condensentrator to convert gases to liquids.$(br)$(br)Set the Rotary Condensentrator to 'Condensating' mode to convert gas into liquid form.
$(bold)Rotary Condensentrator$()$(br)$(br)Converts between gas and liquid states. Set to Condensating mode (arrow pointing down) to produce liquid fuel for your rockets.
